about_the_game:
Aim FTW - Founder's Pack unlocks all characters and monsters within Aim FTW to increase the fun and excitement of your gameplay! You will immediately gain access to 4 new monsters and 2 unique characters. By owning the Founder’s Pack, you can avoid the time it takes to earn these characters through gameplay and start using them as soon as you login.

As a bonus, you will also earn access to content released in future updates with this one time purchase. This includes characters, monsters, agents, weapons and more... The future is bright and full of enemies to battle on your quest to become the best FPS player. Make sure you have access to the wackiest monsters, the toughest agents and the coolest characters as you train. If you are going to train, it might as well be fun!

The Founder's Pack is also a great way for our fans to support future development. Every dollar earned is immediately invested into improving the game and helping you train. We want Aim FTW to be the most enjoyable game of its kind out there and your support makes that possible.

Don’t quit. Become a Founder today!
detailed_description:
Aim FTW - Founder's Pack unlocks all characters and monsters within Aim FTW to increase the fun and excitement of your gameplay! You will immediately gain access to 4 new monsters and 2 unique characters. By owning the Founder’s Pack, you can avoid the time it takes to earn these characters through gameplay and start using them as soon as you login.

As a bonus, you will also earn access to content released in future updates with this one time purchase. This includes characters, monsters, agents, weapons and more... The future is bright and full of enemies to battle on your quest to become the best FPS player. Make sure you have access to the wackiest monsters, the toughest agents and the coolest characters as you train. If you are going to train, it might as well be fun!

The Founder's Pack is also a great way for our fans to support future development. Every dollar earned is immediately invested into improving the game and helping you train. We want Aim FTW to be the most enjoyable game of its kind out there and your support makes that possible.

Don’t quit. Become a Founder today!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 1.6GHZ or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617 1536 MB and up
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 645
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

name: Aim FTW - Founder's Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750 processor or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE® GTX 560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i9 or AMD Ryzen™ series processor or better
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GEFORCE® GTX 10 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

short_description: Unlock all characters and monsters within Aim FTW to increase the fun and excitement of your training sessions! With this one time purchase you also earn access to many future characters, monsters, agents, weapons and more; all while supporting future development of Aim FTW. Become a Founder today!
